name: Liminalia (Commodore Amiga)
description:
The very first multiplayer game made in the Scorpion Engine. Adapt to seasonal changes as you battle in this 48 hour Kiwijam game.

Two players required.

* Race to collect the season changing orbs, or
* Push each other off the screen repeatedly.

Amiga port by earok

Based on the GameMaker PC original by James L, Sean F, Pheebs - https://radnom.itch.io/liminalia
